articles.title: Kim Jong Il Watches Tank Crews' Training
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Watches Tank Crews' Training
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il watched training of Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army.
					 The division is honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					
					 He climbed an observation deck to watch tank crews' training.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction with them who have grown up to be a match-for-a hundred fighters fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique to defend the socialist homeland.
					
					 He set forth tasks for increasing the combat capability of the unit.
					
					 The unit soldiers are exceptionally enthusiastic in their training, he noted, calling for fully preparing all its soldiers as a-match-for-a hundred fighters possessed of high military qualifications and combat ability. To this end he underscored the need to give play to the revolutionary style training of conducting intensive training under the simulated conditions of an actual battle under the slogan "Training Is Also a Battle!"
					
					 The division, which played a pedigree role in strengthening the tank forces of the DPRK, is a vanguard unit both in battles and the ideological field, he said. He expressed great expectation and conviction that the division would carry forward this glorious tradition and exalt its honor as a vanguard unit.
					
					 He had a photo session with the soldiers who took part in the training.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, then inspected a company under the division.
					
					 He went round an education room, a bedroom, a wash-cum-bath house and other cultural, educational and supply service facilities to take deep care of the soldiers living and service.
					
					 He learned about every detail of their living ranging from the use of educational and entertainment means, temperature in the bedroom and water supply in wash-cum-bath house.
					
					 Very pleased to see soldiers leading a happy life in warm bedroom and an education room which has all educational and entertainment means in winter, he praised its commanding officers for having worked hard to provide soldiers with better living conditions.
					
					 It is an important work for increasing combat capability to provide soldiers with good living conditions, he said, calling on the commanding officers to always pay deep attention to supply service.
					
					 He called on the soldiers to always keep themselves combat-ready and steadily increase the combat capability to greatly contribute to the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Accompanying him were Chief of the KPA General Staff Ri Yong Ho who is member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong and Kim Myong Guk who are members of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Greets Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Greets Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Raul Castro Ruz, second secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the victory in the Cuban revolution. 
					  The message said:
					
					 We extend warm felicitations to you, the CPC and the government and people of Cuba in the name of the WPK and the government and people of the DPRK on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the victory in the Cuban revolution. 
					
					 The Korean people are sincerely rejoiced over the many achievements made by the fraternal Cuban people in socialist construction since their victory in the revolution. 
					
					 We, availing ourselves of this opportunity, express belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties, governments and peoples will steadily grow stronger and sincerely wish you and your people bigger successes in the work for the country's development and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Floral Basket to Cuban Embassy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Floral Basket to Cuban Embassy
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a floral basket to the Cuban embassy here on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the victory in the Cuban revolution. 
					 The floral basket was conveyed to Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Galego Montano on Friday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Sudan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Sudan
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, President of Sudan, on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of its independence.
					Kim, in the message, wished the President and the people of Sudan fresh successes in their efforts for the sovereignty, peace, territorial integrity and development of the country and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Palestinian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization and chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of the start of the revolution in Palestine.
					 Reaffirming the DPRK's invariable support for the Palestinian people in their just struggle for regaining the occupied territories and founding an independent state with Kuds as its capital, Kim in the message wished the president success in his work.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Cuban Embassy
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Cuban Embassy
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Ministries and national institutions sent floral baskets to the Cuban embassy here on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the victory in the Cuban revolution.
					 Floral baskets in the name of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Foreign Trade and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries were separately handed to Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, on Friday.

articles.title: Gift from Russian Official
articles.content:
Gift from Russian Official
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Mayor of Khabarovsk A. Sokolov on the occasion of the New Year.
					 The mayor handed it over to an official of the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka on Dec. 28.

articles.title: Ground Breaking Ceremony of DPRK-China Bridge across River Amnok
articles.content:
Ground Breaking Ceremony of DPRK-China Bridge across River Amnok
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- A ground-breaking ceremony for a DPRK-China bridge across the River Amnok took place in Dandong City, China, on Friday. 
					 Present there from the DPRK side were its government delegation headed by Kim Chang Ryong, minister of Land and Environmental Conservation, and from the Chinese side Li Shenglin, minister of Transport, Hu Zhengyue, assistant to Foreign Minister, and Chen Zhenggao, governor of the Liaoning Provincial People's Government, and other officials concerned of the central and local governments of China. 
					
					 Speeches were made by Kim Chang Ryong, Kim Song Gi, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Choe Jong Gon, chairman of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, from the DPRK side and Li Shenglin, Hu Zhengyue, and Chen Zhenggao from the Chinese side. 
					
					They said that two rounds of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's visit to China this year marked historic events of epoch-making significance in developing the DPRK-China friendship on a fresh high stage.
					
					 They expressed belief that the bridge would make a contribution to demonstrating once again the great vitality and invincible might of the DPRK-China friendship steadily growing stronger.
					
					 The bridge will be successfully built as a symbol of the DPRK-China friendship and a structure of the two peoples, they added. 
					
					 Then followed a ceremony of the ground-breaking for the project. 
					
					 The Ministry of Transport, the Liaoning Provincial Committee of the Communist Party and the Liaoning Provincial People's Government of China arranged a reception in connection with the ceremony.

articles.title: Automatic Powder Metal Press Developed
articles.content:
Automatic Powder Metal Press Developed
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The Mechanical Engineering Institute of the DPRK Academy of Sciences has developed a new automatic powder metal press.
					 The institute conceived a hard alloy press and confirmed its structure through a computer simulation. It took a year for the institute to design the press.
					
					 The press succeeded in the test at the first attempt.
					
					 It has been introduced in refining industry to mechanize hard alloy moulding, saving a great deal of labor.
					
					 All the processes, including raw material feeding, moulding and ejection, are streamlined to increase the productive efficiency.

articles.title: Compound Spores for Organic Fertilizers
articles.content:
Compound Spores for Organic Fertilizers
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The Life Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University has developed instant compound spores for organic fertilizers.
					 The compound spores make it possible to control and promote the fermentation of organic matters in a scientific way and sharply raise the production and quality of organic fertilizers.
					
					 They, a mixture of ten kinds of useful spores, including activated cellulose, lignin and protein decomposing bacterium, have a wide range of application.
					
					 They are also applied to domestic animals' excrements, crop straws and shrubs.
					
					 The spores have already been introduced by some farms.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Moves
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The reckless anti-DPRK moves of the south Korean puppet group are the worst treachery against the nation, says Rodong Sinmun, a major newspaper of the DPRK, in a bylined article Friday.
					 Flunkeyism and confrontation with their fellow countrymen are the peculiar physiology and inveterate bad habit of the present south Korean conservative ruling forces, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The group of conservatives in south Korea pursues antagonism, confrontation and war between the north and the south, not reconciliation and unity.
					
					 Its true colors has been disclosed clearly this year when it insisted on the already failed "policy towards the north", disregarding the demand of people at home and abroad for improved north-south relations.
					
					 Furthermore, the puppet bellicose forces produced the conspiratorial warship sinking case this March, escalating mistrust and confrontation between the north and the south. As the truth about the case came to light, they intentionally made the Yonphyong Island shelling incident, another provocation to the DPRK, in November.
					
					 Such action brought halt to the dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south which had been barely maintained. And it drove the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war again.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the conservative forces, in trouble due to the bankruptcy of the "policy towards the north" and the consequent serious ruling crisis, seek a way out in aggravating the tension and igniting a war in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 If the worsened north-south relations are to be improved at an early date and the Korean nation is to achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity, south Korea should halt the anachronistic moves for confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Japan's Cargo Inspection Drill Slashed
articles.content:
Japan's Cargo Inspection Drill Slashed
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Some days ago the Japanese reactionaries staged drill for inspecting cargo of airliners bound for the DPRK. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:  
					
					 This indicates that Japan's anti-DPRK campaign is now getting intensified in the air and seas.
					
					 It is a cunning intention of Japan to fish in troubled waters, taking advantage of the escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 While watching for an opportunity for reinvasion, the Japanese reactionaries are putting spurs to the moves to convert Japan into a military giant by taking advantage of the tension on the peninsula. It was in pursuance of the above-said aim that Japan let the SDF take part in the joint military exercises led by the U.S. and south Korea this year and invited south Korean puppet forces to "observe" the joint military exercises conducted by Japan together with the U.S. 
					
					 Japan has recently made public new "defense program guidelines," a comprehensively improved version of its defense policy, which defined the DPRK's "nuclear and missile development" as "a military threat." 
					
					 This indicates that Japan is in great haste to realize its wild ambition to turn itself into a military power and round off its preparations for reinvasion, availing itself of the U.S. policy of aggression against the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Psychological Campaign Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Psychological Campaign Denounced
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Kimpho Citizens' Solidarity for Democracy and a peace church of south Korea at a news conference on Dec. 27 denounced the puppet authorities for their anti-DPRK psychological campaign. 
					 At the news conference the organizations accused the "government" and its followers of turning on the light on a light-tower in the western sector of the front on Dec. 21 as part of the anti-DPRK psychological campaign. 
					
					 This was a breach of the agreement between the south and north military authorities which bans any psychological campaign in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line, they said, and went on:
					
					 The psychological campaign stepped up by the Lee Myung Bak group in the forefront areas under the pretence of the Yonphyong Island shelling incident is aimed to ignite a war in this land at any cost.
					
					 They urged the Lee Myung Bak regime to stop at once the psychological campaign which may spark off the south-north military clash.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Adverse Change in Its Policy towards DPRK Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Adverse Change in Its Policy towards DPRK Blasted
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification, while defining the core of its working plan for next year, is contemplating replacing the existing "exchange and cooperation" by "proper preparations for unification" and making 2011 the "year for making proper preparations for unification." 
					Leading newspapers Friday observed in their signed commentaries in this regard: 
					
					By "proper preparations for unification" it meant preparations for the unification of systems. 
					
					Rodong Sinmun said: What the above-said ministry uttered in its working plan for next year was a vivid manifestation of its denial of dialogue and any process to improve the relations between the north and the south. It was a declaration of unification of systems quite contrary to the desire of the fellow countrymen for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					By "proper preparations for unification" it meant actively opting to lead unification before simply waiting for someone "to bring about an internal change." 
					
					It is as clear as noonday that these moves of the south Korean conservative forces will only result in precipitating the collapse of the inter-Korean relations and the further deterioration of the situation on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					They will never succeed in realizing the above-said wild dream.
					
					Minju Joson observed: Being colonial lackeys, the south Korean authorities feel uneasy even when their American master frowns at them. Yet they are dreaming of achieving "unification under liberal democracy" in face of the DPRK displaying its might with Songun. This only reminds one of the wild ambition of Don Quote.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Puppet Forces' Military Provocation Assailed
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Puppet Forces' Military Provocation Assailed
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Dec. 21.
					 It accused the U.S. imperialists and the pro-American south Korean bellicose forces of conducting another shelling drill in waters off Yonphyong Island in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 Their military provocation was a product of a cunning scenario to intentionally use the Korean People's Army's military counter-action  as a good opportunity for saving their Asian policy and anti-DPRK strategy from bankruptcy, the statement pointed out, and went on:
					
					The recent provocation was no more than a childish one conducted by cowards without an equal because they staged it, shifting even the waters to be a scene of shelling and its target for fear of the second and third retaliation by the KPA.
					
					 As already declared by the KPA before the world, there will be no limit to its future counter-action and it will lead to blowing up the bases of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers, added the statement.
					
					 The France-DPRK Friendship Association said in a statement on the same day that the reckless military provocation was a blatant challenge to the peace-loving stand of the DPRK and other countries for detente on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The statement declared that the association would launch a widespread international signature campaign urging the DPRK and the U.S. to conclude a peace agreement as early as possible.

articles.title: DPRK's Anniversaries Observed in Austria and Bulgaria
articles.content:
DPRK's Anniversaries Observed in Austria and Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Austrian and Bulgarian organizations issued bulletins on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero. 
					 The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna of Austria carried photos of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk in its bulletin on Dec. 23. 
					
					 The bulletin said: Kim Jong Il further developed in depth the Juche idea and applied it in all fabrics of social life during his Songun leadership. 
					
					 He is visiting KPA units one after another while steering overall state affairs. 
					
					 The bulletin explained the essence of his Songun politics and its great vitality. 
					
					 Kim Jong Suk is always remembered by the Korean people for her great revolutionary career and distinguished disposition and immortal exploits before the country and the revolution, it noted.
					
					 The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association in its bulletin No. 6 carried articles praising the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversaries Observed
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversaries Observed
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries between Dec. 20 and 22 to mark the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					 They included a national seminar in Uganda, lectures in Denmark and Guinea and a round-table talk in Austria.
					
					 On display at the seminar hall were photos on the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and books and photos on the DPRK.
					
					 At the seminar Baguma Isoke, director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il as a prominent statesman. He developed in depth the immortal Juche idea and pursued the unique Songun politics to turn the DPRK to a political, ideological and military power, they added.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism and saw to it that the politics was thoroughly embodied in all fields, said the chief of the Group for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il in Denmark. Thus he strengthened the KPA into an ever-victorious revolutionary army, reliably defended the Korean style socialism and brought a turning point in building a thriving nation, he noted.
					
					 The chief said that Kim Jong Suk was a genuine patriot and an indomitable revolutionary fighter who devoted her life to the sacred struggle to liberate the country and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events in Denmark and Austria.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 31 (KNCA) -- One October day in Juche 99 (2010) General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the newly constructed delicacy restaurant attached to Okryu Restaurant.
					 After going round fashionable dining halls, he was guided to the cookery. He saw a fry-pan and weighed it in his hand. 
					
					 He told officials accompanying him that the fry-pan was some heavy for cooks to use for a while.
					
					 The officials were bewildered by what he said.
					
					 They had been satisfied with high-grade utensils, taking no account of cooks' inconvenience.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia ejercicio de la division de tanques 105 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia ejercicio de la division de tanques 105 del EPC 
						
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, vio un entrenamiento de la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del EPC que obtuvo el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					Tras verlo desde el mirador, el Comandante Supremo se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos los militares de la unidad se hayan convertido en los combatientes bien preparados en lo ideo-politico, lo tecnico-militar y lo fisico y capaces de pelear a solas contra cien enemigos y de defender firmemente la Patria socialista, y presento las tareas para incrementar la combatividad de la unidad.
					
					Es muy elevado el afan de los militares de la unidad por ejercitar, subrayo y apunto la necesidad de establecer un ambiente revolucionario de realizar el ejercicio como batalla real bajo la consigna de "!El entrenamiento es tambien un combate!" para preparar a todos los uniformados como combatientes aguerridos capaces de uno vs. ciento y con muchos talentos militares.
					
					La Division de Tanques 105 Ryu Kyong Su, que cumplio el papel de cantera en el desarrollo de las fuerzas tanquistas de Corea, ha sido vanguardia tanto en el combate como en la ideologia, dijo.
					
					Expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que la division exaltara siempre el honor de guardia manteniendo esa brillante tradicion de lucha y se fotografio junto a los militares participantes en el entrenamiento.
					
					El Dirigente inspecciono luego una compania adscrita a la division.
					
					Recorrio la sala de educacion, el dormitorio, el bano y otros establecimientos de educacion, cultura y de intendencia prestando profunda atencion a la labor y vida de los militares. 
					
					Averiguo en detalles las condiciones de la vida de los militares desde el uso de los medios de cultura y educacion hasta la temperatura del dormitorio y el suministro de agua al bano y tomo las medidas benevolas para ellos.
					
					Se puso muy contento al ver que los soldados llevan una vida feliz en el dormitorio en buena calefaccion en el invierno y en la sala de educacion dotada de todos los medios educacionales y culturales. Reconocio los esfuerzos de los comandantes de la compania que facilitaron a los soldados magnificas condiciones de vida. 
					
					Asegurarles magnificas condiciones de vida a los soldados deviene una labor importante para el incremento de la combatividad, senalo y continuo que los oficiales deben prestar siempre profunda atencion a la intendencia.
					
					Los militares de la unidad deben contribuir activamente a la prosperidad de la patria al prepararse para el combate y trabajar mas intensamente para elevar la combatividad.
					
					En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Pak To Chun, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del BP y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong y Kim Myong Guk, miembros de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, jefes de departamento del CDN.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz 
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, junto con el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 31 un mensaje a Raul Castro Ruz, Segundo Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, para felicitar el 52o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana.
					La misiva sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 52o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, extendemos, en nombre del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el gobierno y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las calidas felicitaciones a Vd., al Partido Comunista de Cuba, al gobierno y el pueblo de la Republica de Cuba.
					
					Nuestro pueblo se alegra sinceramente de muchos exitos que el hermano pueblo cubano alcanza en la construccion socialista despues del triunfo de la revolucion.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, le manifestamos la conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los partidos, los gobiernos y los pueblos de nuestros dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran constantemente y formulamos sinceros votos por mayores exitos en los trabajos de Vd. y su pueblo por el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia cesto de flores a embajada cubana
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia cesto de flores a embajada cubana 
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio un cesto de flores a la Embajada de la Republica de Cuba acreditada en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con motivo del 52o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana.
					El cesto de flores fue entregado el dia 31 al embajador cubano, Jose Manuel Galego Montano.

articles.title: Organos coreanos envian cestos de flores a la embajada cubana
articles.content:
Organos coreanos envian cestos de flores a la embajada cubana
  Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 52o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, los ministerios y un organo central enviaron los cestos de flores a la Embajada de la Republica de Cuba en Corea.
					  Los cestos de flores a nombre del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, el de Comercio Exterior y el Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero fueron entregados el dia 31 al embajador cubano, Jose Manuel Galego Montano, respectivamente.
